name: Feroz Ahmmed
headline: Senior Software Engineer | Building High-Performance Web Applications with .NET Core & Azure | 3x Microsoft Certified
summary: I'm a seasoned web application developer with a proven track record of delivering high-impact solutions across the entire technology stack. I specialize in .NET Core and C# development, with deep expertise in building scalable microservices using modern architectural patterns. My commitment to excellence is backed by formal education from the University of Dhaka and industry-recognized Microsoft certifications. I thrive in fast-paced environments where I can make an immediate impact, mentor others, and continuously push the boundaries of what's possible with modern cloud technologies.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Software Engineering

experience.title: .NET Developer
experience.description: Contributed to the modernization of a mission-critical legacy application for a Fortune 100 North American construction equipment manufacturer.
highlights: Migrated from .NET Framework to .NET Core.
Redesigned and optimized the database schema to align with evolving business requirements.
Developed high-performance solutions for data-intensive operations.
Authored complex SQL Server stored procedures to optimize data import and ingestion.
Implemented performance tuning strategies including query optimization, indexing, and caching.
Collaborated with business stakeholders and subject matter experts.
Conducted thorough performance testing and profiling.
Participated in code reviews and knowledge-sharing sessions.

roles.title: Senior .NET Developer
roles.description: Led and mentored a team of 10 developers, providing technical guidance, code reviews, and best practices.
highlights: Onboarded and trained new team members on microservices architecture.
Spearheaded migration of multiple microservices to newer .NET versions.
Implemented comprehensive monitoring and observability solutions.
Established logging and monitoring best practices.
Architected and maintained distributed tracing and centralized logging infrastructure.
Collaborated with stakeholders to define technical roadmaps.
Conducted technical training sessions and knowledge-sharing workshops.

roles.title: .NET Developer
roles.description: Served as the primary developer, leading the development of a significant portion of the application using C# and .NET Core.
highlights: Designed and developed microservices architecture (DDD, CQRS, Event Sourcing).
Implemented serverless solutions using Azure Functions.
Containerized microservices with Docker and orchestrated deployments using Kubernetes.
Built and maintained CI/CD pipelines using Azure DevOps.
Leveraged Azure CosmosDB as the event store and data persistence layer.
Implemented event-driven architecture for asynchronous communication.
Configured Kubernetes deployments with auto-scaling policies and health checks.

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
experience.description: Contributed to the development of a comprehensive ERP software solution at a startup.
highlights: Worked across the full stack with Node.js, TypeScript, Angular, and MongoDB.
Led development efforts on the Human Resource Management (HRM) module.
Built RESTful APIs using Node.js and TypeScript.
Designed and implemented responsive Angular components.
Architected MongoDB database schemas.
Collaborated closely with stakeholders in a fast-paced startup environment.

experience.title: Angular Developer
experience.description: Developed a comprehensive project management tool using TypeScript and Angular.
highlights: Designed and implemented interactive data visualizations and charts.
Built scalable front-end architecture with Angular components.
Created dynamic dashboards for project analytics.
Collaborated with team members to gather requirements and iterate on UI/UX designs.
Utilized TypeScript to write type-safe, maintainable code.

experience.title: AngularJS Developer
experience.description: Developed responsive and dynamic user interfaces using JavaScript and AngularJS.
highlights: Built reusable components and implemented complex front-end functionality.
Collaborated with senior developers and cross-functional teams.
Debugged and optimized existing code.
Gained hands-on experience with modern web development practices.

volunteer.description: Collaborated with software industry of Bangladesh by merging academic excellence with industrial career success.
